evidence.text: IT IS ORDERED that Defendants’ Motion to Transfer to the United States Court of International Trade (Doc. 18) is GRANTED.

extracted.value: Defendants’ Motion to Transfer to the United States Court of International Trade (Doc. 18) is GRANTED.

evidence.text: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that Defendants’ Motion to Stay (Doc. 20) pending resolution of the Motion to Transfer is DENIED AS MOOT.

extracted.value: Defendants’ Motion to Stay (Doc. 20) pending resolution of the Motion to Transfer is DENIED AS MOOT.

evidence.text: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the hearing set for May 1, 2025, is VACATED.

extracted.value: The hearing set for May 1, 2025, is VACATED.

evidence.text: IT IS ORDERED that Plaintiffs’ motion for preliminary injunction pending appeal (Doc. 42) is DENIED.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs’ motion for preliminary injunction pending appeal (Doc. 42) is DENIED.

evidence.text: IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the hearing scheduled for May 1, 2025, remains vacated.

extracted.value: The hearing scheduled for May 1, 2025, remains vacated.

evidence.text: IT IS ORDERED that Plaintiffs’ Motion for Reconsideration (Doc. 45) is DENIED.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs’ Motion for Reconsideration (Doc. 45) is DENIED.

evidence.text: The motion (Docket Entry No. 7) to dismiss this appeal for lack of jurisdiction is denied without prejudice to renewing the arguments in the answering brief.

extracted.value: The motion (Docket Entry No. 7) to dismiss this appeal for lack of jurisdiction is denied without prejudice to renewing the arguments in the answering brief.

evidence.text: The motion (Docket Entry No. 4) for injunctive relief is referred to the panel assigned to the merits of this appeal.

extracted.value: The motion (Docket Entry No. 4) for injunctive relief is referred to the panel assigned to the merits of this appeal.

evidence.text: Proceedings in this court other than mediation are stayed until the district court rules on the timely tolling motion filed on April 28, 2025.
